name: Pair of Sneakers
description:
Controls:

Move:  WASD or Arrow KeysSwitch Between Characters: Tab or Space 

Quit: Escape *PC ONLY*

Please be cautious when running into corners, I have seen some collision issues but I didn't get the chance to fix them!

If the web version lags for you, feel free to play the downloadable version!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music: BeyondGravity - Digital Trespasser

Made in under 48hrs for GMTK Game Jam 2021 - "Joined Together" and Mini Jam 82: Doodle -  "Only One Room"

You can find me at https://twitter.com/dhafo_

I appreciate everyone that plays the game!

Dev Note: I had originally had an idea where link would be between player + environment where they could join together to get through the stealth mission, but with my current skill level and the time I had left, I decided to instead have player + player where their fate is shared and it is necessary for you to switch between them to win.
